quote.issuer_name: Dongjiang Environmental Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Dongjiang Environmental Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Dongjiang Environmental Co Ltd is a China-based company principally engaged in the resource utilization and harmless treatment of industrial and municipal waste. The Company operates eight segments. Industrial Waste Resource Utilization segment mainly converts materials with reuse value in waste into resource-based products. Industrial Waste Treatment and Disposal segment mainly reduces and harmlessly disposes toxic and harmful wastes. Rare and Precious Metal Recycling segment mainly recycles waste resources and other materials containing ferrous metals. Municipal Waste Treatment and Disposal segment is mainly engaged in the treatment and disposal of municipal waste and the utilization of renewable energy. Renewable Energy Utilization segment is mainly engaged in the comprehensive utilization of renewable energy and waste resources. The Company also operates business through Environmental Engineering and Services segment, Electronic Waste Dismantling segment and Other segment.
